verses.verseStringB: In the name of Allah, the Compassionate, the Merciful.
Condemned are the hands of Abee Lahab, and he is condemned.

verses.verseString: مَا أَغْنَىٰ عَنْهُ مَالُهُ وَمَا كَسَبَ
verses.verseStringB: His wealth did not avail him, nor did what he acquired.
He will enter a Blazing Fire.
Around her neck is a rope of thorns.
